com.hyperwallet.android.ui.common.util

Class DateUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.hyperwallet.android.ui.common.util.DateUtils

  • public final class DateUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Common HW-SDK UI Date Utility class, that will assist on safe presentation of date whatever the mobile device setting is set Locale, Timezone and etc... that dictates how that dates are being presented Moreover all date string to Date object conversion is automatically converted from GMT date string from API to locale Date set by the phone

      • fromDateTimeString

        public static java.util.Date fromDateTimeString(java.lang.String dateString)
        Creates a Date object from string date using API Timezone
        Parameters:
        dateString - String date from API with GMT timezone
        Returns:
        date Date object converted to local timezone
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when string is un-parsable
